_description: Ground truth annotations for ELM JSON validation against Clinical Practice Guidelines
_instructions: For each ELM file, specify the expected validation result and the CPG to validate against

_fields.valid: boolean - Does the ELM correctly implement the CPG recommendation?
_fields.cpg_file: string - Filename of the Clinical Practice Guideline (in same folder)
_fields.expected_errors: array - List of expected error keywords/patterns if invalid
_fields.expected_warnings: array - List of expected warning keywords/patterns
_fields.notes: string - Optional notes about this test case

USPSTFStatinUseForPrimaryPreventionOfCVD.notes: USPSTF Statin Use for Primary Prevention of CVD - should correctly implement the recommendation logic

Condition_and_Medication_Count_FHIRv401..notes: Utility library for counting confirmed conditions and medication requests - should correctly filter conditions by verificationStatus=confirmed and count all MedicationRequests

Chlamydia_Screening_Common_CQL.json.notes: Chlamydia screening CDS for sexually active females age 16-23. Correctly implements demographic check, sexual activity verification, and exclusions for recent screening, pending orders, and documented refusal reasons.

Adult-Weight-Screening-and-Follow-Up-Ope.notes: Standalone implementation. Logic checks for patients 18+ who lack a Body Weight observation (VS 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1045.159) in the past 1 month.

Breast-Cancer-Screening-OpenEMR.json.notes: Validates that females (40+) are screened for breast cancer if no mammogram (VS 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1182.380) exists in the last 1 year.

Colon-Cancer-Screening-OpenEMR.json.notes: Validates that patients (50+) are screened for colon cancer if no colonoscopy (VS ...108.12.1020) exists in the last 1 month.

Prostate-Cancer-Screening-OpenEMR.json.notes: Validates Prostate Screening for Males 50+ who have not had PSA, DRE, or Biopsy in the last 1 month.

Hypertension-Screening.json.notes: INVALID CASE: Code uses Age 25+ (Guideline requires 18+) and 6-month lookback (Guideline requires 1 year).

Statin-Therapy-for-CVD-Prevention.json.notes: INVALID CASE: Code caps age at 80, but Guideline requires screening up to age 85.

Type-2-Diabetes-Diagnosis.json.notes: INVALID CASE: Code uses HbA1c >= 9.0 g% (Severe), but Guideline requires >= 6.5% (Standard Diagnosis).
